name: Thinktag Link Theme
author: wp-thinktag

sections.description:
A simple way to host blog theme party on your WordPress blog or website. Multiple themes can be managed from a single console.
You can have upto 30 participants in each theme. Auto pruning of blogs that do not reciprocate in adding the code on their pages via configuration.

Prerequisites

  • You are a blogger or website
  • Free signup to the http://thinktag.co.uk console

Features

  • Create your theme in 5 mins
  • Add and remove participants
  • Download participant list

See how it works

Arbitrary section

You need to signup for free to the thinktag console https://thinktag.co.uk/secure/signup.html

Documentation

You tube video
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TJ0fU4ieK4U
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ‘linktheme’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin using ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Add the short code to your page or post
sections.faq:
Email support

When you are logged in to the thinktag console, you can raise support tickets or email me

Do you provide some extra “premium” customization ?

Not for the moment, you can email me if you have any custom requirements.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release

1.1

  • Updated URL from test1 to live servers

1.2

  • Updated readme.txt file

short_description: An easy way to host a blog theme party.  The plugin requires free signup to the thinktag.co.uk console for you to add/remove participants.
